title: Why are Plastic Straws Bad and What are the Alernatives?
body: Plastic straws are one of the most common forms of pollution found on beaches and in oceans all over the world. They're bad for the environment, kill marine life and damage human health. Even if you can't go zero waste entirely, it's high time we all ended our reliance on single use plastics.
readable_content:
-AP (2023-12-08): This article provides an overview of the environmental impact of plastic straws and explores alternatives.

The article discusses the negative effects of plastic straws on the environment, marine life, and human health. It outlines the challenges in recycling plastic straws and highlights the harm they cause to the ocean and sea turtles. Additionally, it explores the infiltration of microplastics into the human food chain.

The author suggests banning disposable plastic straws and presents various alternatives, including metal, bamboo, paper, glass, and compostable straws, as well as the option to forgo using straws altogether. The piece also lists places that have already implemented bans on plastic straws.

Overall, the article advocates for the reduction and eventual elimination of plastic straw use and underlines the importance of choosing environmentally friendly alternatives.
summary: The article provides a comprehensive overview of the environmental impact of plastic straws, advocating for their reduction and eventual elimination. It emphasizes the importance of choosing environmentally friendly alternatives. Overall, the sentiment of the article is in favor of banning plastic straws and promoting sustainable alternatives.
